price: A kako će tek biti kad im meleki budu duše uzimali udarajući ih po obrazima i po leđima njihovim!
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
